title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 15 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 15 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Rush feeling good about the country opening. It's always a battle to overcome the naysayers. Mark Cuban named to Trump reopening team, says he wants to help the president. Trump thanks CEOs who made ventilators. Goose Gossage goes on pro-Trump rant. Disney losing $30 million a day. Ohioans protest, want to reopen. Fauci on flattening the curve, sports without fans. NYT amazing story on Trump wanting a radio show. Trump probably is the one of the few who could fill Rush's shoes. Is there unity among the American people to reopen? Michigan protest. Rush health update. Did we really need to shut down? Mark Cuban commits to helping Trump in any way he can. Flattening the curve makes the epidemic last longer. Shocking hospitalization numbers -- for the flu. Michigan caller on protests against Whitmer.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Looking back at the rationales to flatten the curve. Theories on what the ChiComs did on purpose, did they weaponize it from the start? Did they just try to hide the disease? Did they make sure the virus went worldwide once they realized how deadly it was? Dems hope coronavirus can do what Mueller and Schiff couldn't do. Trump has been handed back his slogan. He made America great again once, he can do it again. CNN does segment on "grim life" after reopening. Conservative couple calls from Michigan protest.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


NY Times story on Trump wanting a radio show, but not wanting to compete with Rush. CNN prints ChiCom army propaganda. Trump defunds the WHO. Rush offered President Trump guest host audition, town hall, access to the show whenever he wants. What did the ChiComs know and when did they know it? Coronavirus has resurrected MAGA, Trump has to do it again. LA County official on CNN: Nobody will have any fun when reopen. Illinois caller upset governor bought PPE from China.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
